properties.Title: Palma de Mallorca
properties.Desc: Sponteanous weekend trip with Spanish tapas, beer, and an amazing sunset view from the edge of the Mallorca Island.

properties.Title: Washington DC
properties.Desc: Trying to come up with something creative from my trip to DC...

properties.Title: Sicilian Summer
properties.Desc: We had the longest ever BlaBlaCar ride from Rome to Messina (700 km) with people whom neither we knew nor spoke a common language... But the Sicilian Cannoli definitely made up for all of it!

properties.Title: Bansko (Pirin Mountains)
properties.Desc: I've started skiing at the age of 9 and fell in love with it. Also, I'm one of those people who push the limits of allowed skiing hours since I never get enough. Next step, my goal is to learn how to do the acrobatic moves - but till my next ski trip, I'll just stick with the YouTube tutorial. It's amazing how you can find a tutorial for literally anything these days...

properties.Title: ''Winter in Dubai''
properties.Desc: As it can be seen below, I adapt to change pretty easily... By the way, the average winter daytime temperature in Dubai is 24 ℃.
